Posts.Content: Feb 5, 2016 03:02AM iluvgsd5 wrote: I start chemo in a couple weeks and my Onc recommends A C & T. He said it was the best for all of my stats regarding cancer, (not sure what else to call them) For me, to pick what is best would be to difficult, I am putting my faith in what the Oncoligist feels is best. If you go into "my profile" you can list all your symptoms/stat about your cancer.
Posts.Title: TC vs. ACT in young women...looking for my best options! Csum81 tshire
